 80 -class RotationTrajectory(AbstractTrajectory):

115 -class ConstantPositionTrajectory(PositionTrajectory): 

116      """ 
117      A trajectory with constant position. 
118      """ 
119   

120 -    def __init__(self, position=None): 

121          """ 
122          Initialise the trajectory. 
123   
124          @param position: the constant position of the object (3x1 L{np.ndarray}) 
125          """ 
126          self.staticPosition = np.zeros((3,1)) if position is None else position 

127   

128 -    def position(self, t): 

129          pos = np.empty((3, len(np.atleast_1d(t)))) 
130          pos[:] = self.staticPosition 
131          return pos 

132   

133 -    def velocity(self,t): 

134          return np.zeros((3, len(np.atleast_1d(t)))) 

135   

136 -    def acceleration(self,t): 

137          return np.zeros((3, len(np.atleast_1d(t))))

139 -class ConstantRotationTrajectory(RotationTrajectory):

144 -    def __init__(self, rotation=None): 

145          """ 
146          Initialise the trajectory.

148          @param rotation: the constant rotation of the object (L{Quaternion}) 
149          """ 
150          self.staticRotation = Quaternion() if rotation is None else rotation 

151   

152 -    def rotation(self, t): 

153          if np.shape(t) == (): 
154              return self.staticRotation 
155          else: 
156              rot = np.empty((len(t),4)) 
157              rot[:] = self.staticRotation.components 
158              return QuaternionArray(rot)

189 -class ContinuousRotationTrajectory(RotationTrajectory): 

190      """ 
191      A trajectory with constant rotational velocity. 
192      """ 
193   

194 -    def __init__(self, rotationalVelocity, initialRotation=None): 

195          self.initialRotation = Quaternion() \ 
196              if initialRotation is None else initialRotation 
197          self._rotationalVelocity = rotationalVelocity 
198          w = rotationalVelocity 
199          W = np.asmatrix([[ 0,      -w[2,0],  w[1,0]], 
200                           [ w[2,0],  0,      -w[0,0]], 
201                           [-w[1,0],  w[0,0],  0     ]]) 
202          self.qW = Quaternion() 
203          self.qW.setFromMatrix(expm(W)) 

204   

205 -    def rotation(self, t): 

206          if np.ndim(t) == 0: 
207              return self.qW ** t 
208          else: 
209              return QuaternionArray([self.qW ** ti for ti in t]) 

210   

211 -    def rotationalVelocity(self, t): 

212          omega = np.empty((3, len(np.atleast_1d(t)))) 
213          omega[:] = self._rotationalVelocity 
214          return omega

216 -    def rotationalAcceleration(self, t): 

217          return np.zeros((3, len(np.atleast_1d(t))))
